name: Back to the Wall
effects: Increase ATK and MAG by 50% for 3 turns to all allies
Reduce DEF and SPR by 20% for 3 turns to all allies
Restore 10 (+0.3x, MP) MP split over 3 turns to all allies

name: Back to the Wall
背水之陣
배수진
Dos au mur
Rücken zur Wand
Depredador
desc_short: Reduce DEF and SPR and boost ATK and MAG for all allies, and gradually restore MP
降低全體隊員防禦精神的數值同時提高攻擊魔力的數值+持續恢復MP
아군 전체의 방어력과 정신력 감소, 공격력과 마력 상승+MP 서서히 회복
Réduit DEF/PSY, aug. ATT/MAGIE de tous les alliés et restaure progressivement les PM
Verringert ABW und PSY, aber erhöht ANG und MAG aller Verbündeten, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Reduce DEF y ESP y aumenta ATQ y MAG de todos los aliados, recupera PM poco a poco
desc_long: Reduces DEF and SPR and boosts ATK and MAG for all allies, and gradually restores MP
降低全體隊員防禦精神的數值，同時提高攻擊魔力的數值，並持續恢復MP。
아군 전체의 방어력과 정신력이 감소하고, 공격력과 마력이 상승하며, MP를 서서히 회복합니다.
Réduit DEF/PSY, aug. ATT/MAGIE de tous les alliés et restaure progressivement les PM
Verringert ABW und PSY, aber erhöht ANG und MAG aller Verbündeten, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Reduce la DEF y el ESP y aumenta el ATQ y la MAG de todos los aliados, recupera los PM progresivamente.
